name: Lumi and the Dark Night
description:
Lumi and the Dark Night

Help Lumi escape from the darkest depths and restore the Light in this 2D platformer. 

  • Explore 6 levels which include dangerous enemies and  2 boss fights.
  • Unlock new abilities to help Lumi traverse each level.
  • Discover secret areas - can you get 100% completion in each level?
Controls

A gamepad is recommended.

Note: Our testing verified that an Xbox or PS4 gamepad should work under Windows or Mac environments in Chrome/Edge/Firefox browsers.

Gam Jam

Made for the Game Off 2020 game jam by TX Brothers.

Use of theme: In addition to featuring a literal "moonshot" in the opening scene, this was a very ambitious project for us since we are new to game development.
